family.description: Family of lattice Schwinger functions derived from the Wilson action, stable under RG.

bounds.details: Uniform bounds derived from Balaban UV stability (see uv_constants.json). Uniqueness from convergent cluster expansion.

invariances.details: Lattice symmetries preserved by unique limit. Euclidean invariance restored by rotation invariance of the fixed point (verified in verify_lorentz_restoration_strict.py).

rp_and_os.details: RP holds on lattice (verify_reflection_positivity.py) and passes to limit via weak convergence. Clustering follows from mass gap.

provenance.source: Generated by generate_schwinger_evidence.py based on UV+RP proofs.

proof.detail: Formal tightness/uniqueness/RP-passing proof artifact not yet supplied (theorem-boundary).
